channel.title: go on Miguel Abate
channel.description: Recent content in go on Miguel Abate

item.title: Jwt Token Auth in Golang
item.description: A Go module that exposes basic operations for user management in a REST context (signup, signin, refresh, logout) using JWT.

item.title: Reddit Urls Scraper
item.description: Showcasing a command line tool to fetch urls from posts from a given subreddit.

item.title: Protobuf communication between Js-client and Go-server
item.description: In this article, I present a small Proof of Concept of communication between a browser (Js) and a server (Golang) using Protocol Buffers over Websockets. This idea emerged as part of a bigger personal project I’m working on and will probably show here in the future.
